posts.post_content: Probably the most straightforward and best of the ally-color creatures in M13. A 2/2 for ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol) with the opportunity to be a 3/3, and the chance to attack straight away if you have a spare ![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol)? Very aggro, and the art is suitably feral.
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
The internal design and flavor of this card is just perfect. It's a boar, in the forest, so it's ![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol). But if you start a fire in that forest with ![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol) the boar runs twice as fast, thus haste.  
  
Masterpiece.

posts.post_content:
Works soooo well in a gruul aggro deck. A good early game aggressor or a good late game sneak attack.  
  
He pairs really well with [Arbor Elf](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Arbor Elf) too, since that way you can get a 3/3 haste swinging as early as turn two thanks to [Stomping Grounds](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stomping Grounds).

Posted By: patronofthesound (6/2/2013 4:26:37 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
The thing that is so good about this card right now is it is pretty flexible. A 3/3 on turn two or a 3/3 with haste turn three is pretty significant as with aggro you can't have poop hands and expect to win (unless you like touching people with poop hands, ewwwww!). Basically can fill the slot of [Call of the conclave](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Call of the conclave), and [Dreg Mangler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dreg Mangler). With easier casting cost for the centaur.  
  
With [Burning-tree emissary](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Burning-tree emissary), [Lightning Mauler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Mauler), and the rest of the aggro suite this can get crazy fast.
posts.html:
The thing that is so good about this card right now is it is pretty flexible. A 3/3 on turn two or a 3/3 with haste turn three is pretty significant as with aggro you can't have poop hands and expect to win (unless you like touching people with poop hands, ewwwww!). Basically can fill the slot of Call of the conclave, and Dreg Mangler. With easier casting cost for the centaur.

With Burning-tree emissary, Lightning Mauler, and the rest of the aggro suite this can get crazy fast.
